div.p:
Curia balliuorum de abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem xxv die
mensis Octobris quo Supra

The saide day the balyeis assignit friday the ferde day of nouember
next to Cum to Jonhne Wormet to preiwe his allegeance agan
thomas Dauisone

The saide day the balyeis assignit friday the ferd day of nouembre
to thome ridaile to ansuer to the borghe' strekit one him be thomas
prat procurator to the ayr of Williame malisone for the wranguis'
avay takin of ane govne pertening to the said'

The said' day thomas gerdane grantit he hed' laid the belt
in wed' to Williame Ranisone that Androw Kennartj followit et cetera

The saide day Androw litstar was in Amerciament of the court for the wranguis'
pertening with the clath arrestit in his handis at the challance of alexander
chamer and to Amend' as law will be ane Suorne assis' Jonhne
Culane forspekar

Curia balliuorum de abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem vltimo die octobris
quo supra

Eodem die Johannes fullertone conuictus fuit per assisam ex ore Johannis
Culane prelocutoris eiusdem pro perturbio henrici Rede Et Idem henricus conuictus
pro perturbio dicti Johannis and quilibet emendabit ut Jura volunt Et
si quis eorum In postrum alteri perturbium commiserit et Inde conuictus fuit
soluet xl s' fabrice ecclesie

Eodem die ballivi constituerunt Dauid talyour' persoluere Willelmo lammyntone xiiij
s' infra terminum Juris pro debito georgej smitht et cetera

Curia balliuorum de abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem quarto die
nouembris quo Supra

The saide day Robert Walcar said' oppinlie he suld' gif his hed and euire
he saide that frer' Dauid andirsone priour' of the predicatoris of abirdene spek ony
evile langis of my lord' of abirdene nor maid' ony wrang rehers' of
his lordschipe

the said' day It was deliuerit be ane Suorne assis' William futhes
forspekar that thome ridaile sal restoir' the govne in the place quhar'
he fand' it

the said' day Robert' Walcar' was in ane amerciament of the court be ane Suorne
assis' William futhes forspekar for the wranguis' Stopin of the
wattir fra the Spovt of the place of the freris predicatoris and to amend'
as law wile and forbeir in tyme to Cum

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem
xiiij die mensis Nouembris

The saide day Jonhne WilJhonsone' grantit him avande
to Androue Cristesone xvj s' of Siluer quhilkis the balyeis
chargit him to pay vithtin terme of lawe

The saide day thome grige was in amerciament of the Court
for the wrangwis' strublance of Dauid spens in worde
and tile amende as law will and forber' in tyme tocum and the
saide thomas sal pay to the haly blud licht half a pund
of wax and gif euir he committis ony strublance in tyme cuming
tile the said Dauid or ony vtheris nichbouris he sale pay
to sanct nicholes' werk fourtj s'

The said day thome grige was in amerciament of the court Alexander
Red forspekar for the vrangvis' strublance of Dauid straloche
and tile amend as law will and fors forber' in tyme tocum

Curia balliuorum de abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem xviij die
octobris anno quo Supra

the saide day thir personis vndir writin gilbert menyeis Androw
Culan yongar androw murray eldar patrik leslie Alexander gray William
ranisone James Kennartj William buchan baxtar gilbert litstar Cristj
prat William coupar Jonhne Red' Wobstar and Robert' Walcar' in the
skulhill was chosin and Suorne the gret aithe to taxt and extent
xxxtj li' to be gevin to the Sustentacion of the duk of yorkis men'

Burgenses et fratres gilde tempore prepositure domini Johannis ruthirfurd'
anno Domini Mmo quadringentesimo nonagesimo Sexto

Patricius tulidef Jure paternitatis recipitur in liberum burgensem prestito solito
Juramento et Soluto v s' in alba bursa

Johannes patirsone Jure paternitatis recipitur in liberum burgensem et fratrem
gilde prestito Solito Juramento et solut' v s' in alba bursa

Johannes mar' filius alexandri mar' Recipitur in liberum burgensem et fratrem
gilde Jure paternitatis Solut' v s' in alba bursa et solito prestito
Solito Juramento

Johannes litstar filius quondam thome litstar Jure paternitatis recipitur in
liberum burgensem et fratrem gilde prestito solito Juramento et Solut' v s' in alba bursa

Alexander King recipitur in liberum burgensem et fratrem gilde quia sponsavit filiam
burgensem prestito Solito Juramento et Solut' v s' in alba bursa
Jacobus lindesay Jure paternitatis recipitur in liberum burgensem prestit

Matheus branche iure paterno recipitur in liberum burgensem et fratrem
gilde solut' v s' in alba bursa et prestito solito Juramento

Walterus Srathachin Jure paternitatis recipitur in liberum burgensem et fratrem gile
prestito Solito Juramento et solut' v s' in alba bursa

Alexander lindesay Jure paternitatis recipitur in liberum burgensem et fratrem gilde prestito
Solito Juramento et soluto v s' in alba bursa

Andreas burnat recipitur in liberum burgensem et fratrem gilde de mandato
consilij quia sponsavit filiam domini de many burgensis prestito solito Juramento et solut' v s'
in alba bursa
Dauid lousone Jure paternitatis recipitur in liberum burgensem

Jacobus corne recipitur in liberum burgensem quia Sponsavit filiam burgensem
Solut' v s' in alba bursa et prestito Solito Juramento

Johannes hay Carnifex recipitur in liberum burgensem quia sponsavit filiam burgensem solut'
v s' in alba bursa prestito Solitoque Juramento

Thomas andirsone textor recipitur in liberum burgensem
quia Sponsauit filiam burgensem solut' v s' in alba bursa et solut' v s'
prestito Solito Juramento

Andreas mortymer recipitur in liberum burgensem et fratrem gilde
quia sponsavit burgensem prestito solito Juramento et solut' v s' in alba bursa

Curia balliuorum de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem xxj die mensis nouembris
octobris anno quo Supra

The saide day Johne litstar be his awne tong graunt was
in ane Amerciament of the Court for the wranguis' persevin of thomas
chapman his nichbouris in ane temporal action' befor the Spirituale Juge
refusing his aldirman and ballieis his Juge ordinar in sic thingis for the
quhilkis he putt him in the aldirman and balyes will

The saide day Jonhne Ramsay Androw cristesone and Alexander hay grantit
that thai hed' drvnkin part of ane Stik of wyne pertening to
Robert of Culane within Danskin

The saide day the balyeis chargit androw chamer to pay the x s'
to Jonhne barbour within terme of law

The saide day Jonhne of tulibo was quyt be ane Suorne
assis' Williame blinsel forspekar of all Strubulance of cristy
prat and Androw lousone et cetera Anent the clame of j oxe

the saide day Jonhne Wilyongsone grantit he drank part of
the said' Robertis of Cullannis wyne in Danskin

Curia balliuorum de abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem xxvijo
die mensis nouembris quo Supra

The saide day Comperit Alexander liell and askit ane almary
to borghe' arrestit at the Instance of the Instance of the
Relict of Alexander stokar and Jonhne barbour' procuratouris to the said'
woman and allegit the said' almary hirris and bocht fra the
said' Alexander and askit hir ane lauchful day to preiwe
the said' almary hirris and the aldirman and balyeis assignit this
day xv dais gif it be lauchfule and falyeing tharof the
next lauchfule day thareftir to preiwe his allegeance

The said' day the aldirman and balyeis assignit tis day xv
dais to Alexander chamer of murchil to ansuer to the borghe' strekit
one him be Androw chamer for the wranguis' haldin fra him
of iij li' to Covnt and Rekning

Be It kende tile ale mene be thir present lettres ws Aldirman bailyeis counsale and communite of
Abirdene to be bundin and stratlie oblist and be the tenour of thir lettres lelelie and treulie bindis and oblis'
ws to our continuale familiar' seruitour Robert huchosone sangstar forsamekle' as he is becumin
our conducit and feit familiar sangstar be the fath of his bodie ale the dais of his lywe to Remane
with ws personalie to singe kep ande vphald mess' matutinis evinsangis completoriis
psalmis Respondis Autophinis ympnis ande ale othir houris and divine seruice to be sungin
within our parrochekirk of Abirdene at the letronez ande by batht festuale and feriale dais
pfor the saide obseruance to be kepit and done ws binde and oblis' ws ande our Successouris
yerlie to the saide Robert in the Some of tuentyfour markis vsuale money of scotlande
for ale the dais of his lywe To the pament of the quhilkis weyand assignit Ande be
thir present lettres assignis to the saide Robert auchtene markis of the malis of our vuirmyle
four markis of the fermes of our landis of bogferlow Ande tua markis of our kirk
bred to be Rasit and vptakin at his avine hande at tua vsuale in the yer that Is to say
mertimes and Witsonday be evinlie porcionis for ale the dais of his liwe Ande Atour
your vniuersite sale vit vs to haue grantit our sange scoule to the saide Robert for the quhilkis
he sale with ale diligence possibilite ande besines teche Informe mak leir and Instruk
ale barnis vndir his Cur' Ande specialie the barnis burges sonnis native borne of
this burgh' to sing and play one the organis to the stuffing fortifeing ande vphalding
of goddis seruice in the saide queir' thai payand him his scolage ande dewites
according tharto Ande sale vtirlie wark one the vphalding of goddis seruice
and Instruking of barnis Ande he sale play one the orgainis In tymes of ale divine
quhen It is sene expedient be the Aldirman balyeis consale or the chaplanis of the
college of the kirk one festiuale and verk dais gif the saide Robert falyeis
in the obseruing of goddis seruice or in ony poyntis befor writin It salbe considerit
be the Aldirman balyeis and consale and he punyst tharfor in his fee for his demeritis
as thai thing mast expedient Ande gif the saide Robert happinnis to failye in
the keping and obseruing of ony poynt befor expremit and beis conuikit thris' tharintile
be the Aldirman bailyheis ande Consale It salbe
lesium lesum to tham to dispone apone
the saide fee tile ony vtheris quhar thai think mast expedient for the tyme
but ony Impediment excepcion' or demavnde Age and Infirmite Alanerlie excepit
Ande we the saidez Aldirman bailyheis consale and communite and oure Suc
cessairis sale warande kep ande defende the saide assignacion' of
tuentj four merkis yerlie' and termlie to be Rasit be the saide Robert
of the malys ande kirkbred befor expremit for ale the dais of
his lywe for his dailie seruice to be done In maner and forme befor
writtin ale fraude and gile awaput In witnessing of the quhilkis
we haue appensit our commone Seile to thir lettres at Abirdene'
the Sevint day of Octobre the yer' of god jM iiijc nyntj and
Sex yeris
The copy of the Assignacion' assignit
to Robert huchosone in his fee

I Robert huchosone sangstar oblis' me be the fatht of my
body to my singuler mastiris the aldirman balyeis consal and
communite of abirdene to discharge me of the tua markis yerlie
assignit to me of thar' kirk breid' quhat tyme that
thai mak me sikir of tua merkis yerlie for al the
dais of my lyve In Ony vthir strenyeable place
but fraud' or gil In witnes' of the quhilkis I haue
subscriuit this writ with myn hand' at Abirdene the last day
of Nouembre the yer of god jm iiijc nyntj and sex yeris
robertus huchoson
manu proprea

The thrid day of December' the yer' forsaid' the aldirmane
and Consall assignit to sere Robert Waus v li' to be
tane of thomas pratis demi nethis fischingis of the Raik
of this next yer' to Cum

the saide day the aldirman and the Counsal present for the tyme
gravntit to Wille Wricht the wast pece of land' liande
one the northt part of Sanct Nicholece kirk yerde dik
betuix the land' of vmquhilll Donald' talyour' one the west part
and the kingis gate One the Est and north partis gif it be at
thar' gift that thai may dispone tharapone for the quhilkis
the said' William sal ger' dicht and keip clene the commone
gat fra the northt kirkstill to the land' of vmquhill
thomas mydynnis and sal vphald our lady herte and Sanct
nicholes herte deulie as efferis

Curia balliuorum de abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem x die Decembris
quo Supra

Eodem die Alexander tullouche de moncoffir in amerciamento Curie per assisam
Juratam ex ore David mathesone prelocutorem assise pro perturbio Andree balcromy
Cuj emendabit ut Jura volunt

The saide day marchemond harrald' allegit the lande liand in the
gallowgate pertening to vmquhile arthour' forbes his fee and heritage
be chartir and Sesin quhilkis Is in Edinburghe Ande alexander tulloche
of moncoffir allegit the said' land his fee and heritage and askit ane lachful
day to produce thar' richtis Ande the aldirman and balyes assignit
this day fourtj dais gif it be lauchful and falyeing tharof the
next lauchfull day thareftir to produce thar richtis befor thame
anent the said' lande quhilkis thai will vys'

Curia balliuorum de abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem xij die
Decembris anno quo Supra

Eodem die Alexander chamer de murchil legittime vocatus responsurus plegio
alias super ipsum per andream chamer porrecto pro iniusta detencione
ab eo trium li' ad Compotum non comparuit Igitur precipitur philippo
Dunbrek seriando capere districtum ab eodem et ipsum ad plegium
dimittj si petatur Ac eundem Alexandrum premunire ad proximam curiam
legalem post festum Natiuitatis Domini tanquam seriando die huius processus

The saide day the aldirman and balyeis continevit the
action' debatable' betuix alexander lindesay and Wat colp anent
the clame of xvj s' for certane caldronis and cardis
clamit be the said alexander to the law dawday eftir yule
next to Cum
